title: Creative Preview
description: A sample creative preview generated by the seller for a product. Represents how the seller would render an ad using the buyer's catalog and brand assets. These are representative samples â€” the full set of creatives is generated at execution time when the buyer commits via create_media_buy.

generated_creative_ref.description: Unique identifier for this preview within the product. Buyers reference this in refinement feedback to give per-creative direction (e.g., 'gen_abc needs shorter headlines').

format_id.description: Format this preview was generated for. References a format from the product's format_ids.

renders.description: Rendered preview outputs. One entry per rendered piece (primary, companion, etc.). Sellers SHOULD use url output_format to avoid inflating buyer agent context windows with inline HTML.

catalog_item_ref.description: Identifier of the catalog item this preview was generated from. References an item_id, GTIN, or other identifier from the buyer's catalog. Absent when the preview is not catalog-driven.

description.description: What this preview shows. Helps buyers evaluate the creative approach without rendering the preview.
